label: The Taming Power of the Great
i_ching_name: Da Chu / The Taming Power of the Great

shadow.name: PRIDE
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of The Taming Power of the Great, expressing through pride

gift.name: ARTFULNESS
gift.description: The gift frequency of The Taming Power of the Great, expressing through artfulness

siddhi.name: INVISIBILITY
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of The Taming Power of the Great, expressing through invisibility

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 26 shadow frequency. The pride you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural artfulness. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from pride to artfulness.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your heart. Notice the sensation of pride.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 26 consciously for 7 days, the pride pattern will shift toward artfulness.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 26 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from pride toward artfulness
